data.actual_result: Field name has always the same "style".
data.expected_result: Some Markdown should be shown for the field name of the embed like for the iOS version (there you can see the Markdown)
data.short_description: Markdown formatting for field name for rich embeds not shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Create/get a rich embed - Add a field for it - Use markdown (for example bold `**` or italics `*`) for the field name - Observe the outcome in Discord
